attributes.action: Stop any plans of an internet license fee now and in the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are attempts to introduce a license fee on anyone with a connection to the internet.

People who access the internet such as myself do not access BBC content. It is unfair to make us pay a TV license to access global information via the Internet.

The BBC has almost no influence on the internet and should not be allowed to charge internet users so that they can fund their TV medium.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop any plans of an internet license fee now and in the future."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17042


Prime Minister's Office
